solution_line_template: He is paid ${weekly_pay} every week for {num_weeks} weeks, so Carl made {weekly_pay} * {num_weeks} = $<<{weekly_pay}*{num_weeks}={total_earnings}>>{total_earnings} in {num_weeks} weeks
Each candy bar cost ${candy_bar_cost} and he made ${total_earnings} so {total_earnings}/{candy_bar_cost} = <<{total_earnings}/{candy_bar_cost}={num_candy_bars}>>{num_candy_bars} candy bars
